page.title: 03Employment in Chilton area.
page.content: Spennymoor, four miles to the north east of Chilton, with factories making houeshold electrical appliances, such as washers, cookers, freezers, micro- wave ovens and power tools also has a lot of Chilton people working there. Other places further afield that employ people from Chilton include Bishop Auckland, Darlington and Durham City. Our own industrial estate at Chilton has specially built factory units that house a wide range of interests including light engineering, window making, chemical cleaner manufacture and pet food manufacture. Some factories are still being built on this estate and it is hoped that they will bring more employment to the area. Most of the area is farmland but only few people work on the land.
